title: Hi, I'm Gabriel. A web developer based in Brazil.
aboutText: I'm a restless mind, always looking for something to learn. I like when other people use my creations. When I want to make something, I'm not intimidated if I need to learn new things. Quite the contrary. I'm moved by challenges.
myJourneyText: I started my journey in the world of programming in 2012, when I learned C to program embedded devices. I soon fell in love with programming, studying it always more.  Still with the embedded perspective, I learned C++ and Python. With programming ever more present in my life, I decided to explore areas still unknown to me. I always liked to learn the most recent technologies. Wanting to create more modern applications, I learned HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Since I love creating apps that are used by others, I used my knowledge to create a third party tool for a game I used to play. I also modded another game. Having to learn a new programming language and 3D modelling, something I was completely new to, was a challenge for me, which is what drove me forward. Finally, after many projects, I decided to turn this hobby into my career, making this website and accepting jobs.
